analysis.description:
iotpowerToken.startDate (/unique_contracts/0xb382b398a979497c7c927f1053694fae471bbaa5.sol#107-108) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_contracts/0xb382b398a979497c7c927f1053694fae471bbaa5.sol#235-268)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xb382b398a979497c7c927f1053694fae471bbaa5.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0xb382b398a979497c7c927f1053694fae471bbaa5.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0xb382b398a979497c7c927f1053694fae471bbaa5.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
